Title: Enacts the "help parents find and afford child care act"
Summary: Enacts the "help parents find and afford child care act"; provides for child care subsidies to be administered under the child care assistance program; establishes a tri-share child care program; establishes an at-home infant care program; makes related provisions.
LawCode: Add Art 6 Title 7-A §§435 - 435-f, Soc Serv L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the social services law, in relation to enacting the "help parents find and afford child care act"
